website_summaries.verdict: A favorite of those who RV and rely on this tank when out in the open on a potentially gas-station-less road.
pros: Surprisingly easy to move when it's not full
Sized perfectly to fit into the beds of most trucks
Fits securely while on a truck bed or other platform
Customers appreciate the quick and simple installation process as well
cons: A hose and nozzle would be great add-ons, however most customers are happy with this tank as is

customer_reviews.title: 60 Gallon on 2017 F250 6.7.
customer_reviews.text: Added to my 17 F250 6.7. When towing my 38ft 5th wheel could only go about 230 miles and could only fuel at truck stops. Stressful...with 60 extra gallons can go over 700ish miles. Well worth the money hands down. I threw the RDS install kit in the trash and bought all the hardware from Lowes. Also improvised the fuel filler adapter install. Hacksawed 8 inches off the fuel filler next and saved dropping the tank for install. BTW can go over 1400 miles between fill ups.
customer_reviews.author: ammotroop1991

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tank.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived as it should have and install was simple. I filled the tank once and after that the fuel cap won't come back off. The cap isn't locked and as you try to turn it off you can see metal shavings falling out as it doesn't properly grab the threads. Over all the tank is good quality but poor quality fuel cap. Thankfully I'm not using and transfer pump and still have a place to fill the tank.
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Extra fuel
customer_reviews.text: Instructions called for neoprene strip and special bolts with tension springs. Non of these items were with the tank nor did RDS reply to my mail inquiring where to purchase these items. So you need to head to the hardware store and pickup what you need for that. The tank install was straight forward and works well.
customer_reviews.author: OKCreader

customer_reviews.title: Install kit not included with shipment
customer_reviews.text: Received this unit on Monday. It did not come in a box, just with the shipping label attached. Not really surprising, but the tank looks fine and sits well in the truck. However when we called RDS to ask a question about the rollover valve they indicated it should have come with an install kit that included neoprene strips on the bottom, bolts and springs. None of this had come with the unit. RDS was kind enough to ship an install kit to us.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Hall

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was exactly as expected. Bought kit and hooked it up gravity flow. Extremely pleased! No more having to refuel at expensive truck stops. Perfect size for me! I tow a 15,000 pound, 39’ fifth wheel with. 3500 Ram dually.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil C.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my 3500 ram short bed with 5th wheel. Love the distance between fill ups. gravity fed is a must super quality and look many comments from from fellow rvers
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tank. Only complaint that I have is that it states 60 gallon capacity, but I could only get 58 gallons into it. Other than that, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: This tank is well built and fits perfectly in back ...
customer_reviews.text: This tank is well built and fits perfectly in back of my short bed 1/2 ton Silverado. This tank is a must to give an RV'er a longer pulling distance to avoid gas stations every 180 miles. Would definetly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: snipnjen19

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my short bed chevy. Installed with the RDS gravity feed kit and everything works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: anthony fong

customer_reviews.title: Good tank
customer_reviews.text: Good tank, however the cap leaks fuel everywhere. Would be interesting to see if a better cap fixed this problem
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Holsomback

customer_reviews.title: Dot
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact the shipping department or whom this may concern stuck a white sticker barcode over my dot sticker on the side that is very important and the sticker wouldn’t come off have to get something to get it peeled off which is taking time. Don’t put a sticker on something so important on the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: Tank looks well made but I ordered 2 and received 1? The 1 I received was dented where the drain bung is welded but not a big deal to me. Would give 5 stars if I received both tanks
customer_reviews.author: Kbc

customer_reviews.title: awesome tank!
customer_reviews.text: I cant brag enouth about this tank,i installed it in my 2013 dodge ram 2500 short bed and the fit is perfect.i wanted a tank but did not want to see it,and besides the filler neck you don't even know its there.i used the rds install kit and it fills my truck on the go.i wouldn't hesitate buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS BREWER

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit , the cap is the only thing you can see above the box rail
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tank fit perfectly in a 2018 F-350 dually
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RDS tank model # 71212
customer_reviews.text: Tank arrived in 4 days in new condition ! easy install in less than 2 hours ! this is my 4th RDS transfer tank and their products are the best inside and out !
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Best tank good valve
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my tank it came in about 4 days after ordering. Was easy to install only 3 holes in my bed. Put in the back of my F250 SD long bed. Fit was good gave me about 4 inches on both sides and the only things that go above the top rails are the pump head and the fill cap. Working great so far. Don’t have to keep stopping at gas stations and anyone that tows an RV knows how big a pain that is. Looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: chuck venrick

product_meta.title: Rds 71212 56" Length x 13" Width x 19.25" Height Rectangular Auxiliary/Transfer Fuel Tank - 60 Gallon Capacity
product_meta.description:
RDS-71212 Diamond Plate/60 Gallon Tp Rds-71212 Rds 55-200 Gallon Aluminum Transfer Tanks For Gas Or Dies Dot Approved - 25, 55, 60, 69, 80, 91, 150 And 200 Gallon Choices Tags: 

RDS Rectangular Fuel Transfer Tanks Feature: 

A DOT-approved tank can be used to transport diesel, gasoline, or aviation fuel. No-Rust 0.125" thick heavy-duty aluminum construction. Available tread plate of mill finish Fully welded seams and 100% pressure tested for leaks. Inernal built-in baffles reduce sloshing and weight transfer. DOT Approved rollover safety valve (vent). Includes 3/8" FTP drain plug and 3/8" coupling for pick up. A tank that can be used as a diesel aux tank with extra cost gravity feed installation kit. Big Brother is Watching - The DOT has some specific rules about carrying diesel fuel or gasoline. RDS Transfer Tanks are DOT certified for transferring diesel, gasoline, or aviation fuel. However, laws will vary from State to State - so we STRONGLY suggest that local and state level ordinances be reviewed before the purchase of a transfer or auxiliary tank. 

It Pays To Buy The Best - On some things, quality and experience should be your first consideration. RDS has been building aluminum transfer and auxiliary tanks for over 45 years. RDS products' build quality meets DOT's stringent standards and DOT certification is not a one-time thing. Facilities and construction techniques are constantly monitored and must be maintained to keep the certification. Thick 1/8" aluminum, continuously welded seams, and pressure testing for leaks are all part of the RDS manufacturing process. 

A Tank is Not Just a Tank - In the fuel tank world, a "Transfer Tank" is one that's used with a pump attached to fuel equipment or vehicles other than the vehicle carrying the tank. However, there's no rule against refueling the truck carrying the tank. The main thing is that the tank is not part of the truck's own fuel system. Tanks that are integrated into the truck
feature_bullets: Diesel install kits are available for diesel gravity feed (sold separately)
DOT Approved Tank with 1/8" heavy-duty aluminum construction
